name: skills (matlab)
description: [项目级] A collection of Agent Skills for MATLAB development. Skills are specialized instruction sets that extend a coding agent's capabilities for specific tasks, automatically activating when needed.。来源: https://github.com/matlab/skills

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content: A collection of [Agent Skills](https://agentskills.io) for MATLAB development using coding agents. Skills are specialized instruction sets that extend the capabilities of coding agents for specific tasks, automatically activating when needed.
